message.name: ERR_PDC_EVIDENCE_LINK_XRV_EVIDENCE_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: Evidence of this type already been associated with participant data case.

message.name: ERR_PDC_EVIDENCE_LINK_FV_PDC_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a Participant Data Case.

message.name: ERR_PDC_EVIDENCE_LINK_XRV_EVIDENCE_TYPE_ON_CASE
message.locale: Evidence cannot be removed as the associated evidence type is currently being used by one or more participant data cases.
